document.docAuthor: Li, Yang, He, Jun-Hua & Chen, Xue-Xin
document.masterDocTitle: Review of six genera of Braconinae Nees (Hymenoptera, Braconidae) in China, with the description of eleven new species

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Review of six genera of Braconinae Nees (Hymenoptera, Braconidae) in China, with the description of eleven new species

bibRefCitation.author: Kawall, J. H.
bibRefCitation.refString: Kawall, J. H. (1865) Die den genuinen Ichneumoniden verwandten Tribus in Russland, vorzugsweise in Kurland. Bulletin de la Societe Imperiale des naturalistes de Moscou, 38 (4), 331 - 380.

figureCitation.captionText-0: FIGURE 53. Vipio sareptanus Kawall, 1865, ♀, habitus lateral.
figureCitation.captionText-1: FIGURE 54. Vipio sareptanus Kawall, 1865. ♀. a. fore wing; b. hind wing; c. mesosoma, lateral view; d. mesosoma, dorsal view; e. metasoma, dorsal view; f. hind leg, lateral view; g. head, front view; h. head, dorsal view; i. head, lateral view; j. scapus outer side, lateral view; k. apex of antenna; l. apex of ovipositor, lateral view.

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:

. Synonymized by

.

caption.paragraph:
FIGURE 53.
Vipio sareptanus Kawall, 1865
, ♀, habitus lateral.

FIGURE 54.
Vipio sareptanus Kawall, 1865
. ♀. a. fore wing; b. hind wing; c. mesosoma, lateral view; d. mesosoma, dorsal view; e. metasoma, dorsal view; f. hind leg, lateral view; g. head, front view; h. head, dorsal view; i. head, lateral view; j. scapus outer side, lateral view; k. apex of antenna; l. apex of ovipositor, lateral view.

subSubSection.paragraph: Distribution. China (* Gansu , * Jilin , * Liaoning , Nei Menggu, Ningxia , Qinghai , * Shanxi , Xinjiang ); Iran , Kazakhstan ; Korea ; Latvia ; Mongolia ; Russia ; Ukraine .

Note. Watanabe (1940) first reported this species from Nei Menggu (NW. China ) and
You et al . (1994)
reported the species from Ningxia , Qinghai and Xinjiang (NW. China ).
